docs.snippet: Iran's supreme court has ruled that a woman must be blinded in one eye as punishment for an acid attack that left her victim sightless, using the principle of "eye for an eye" of Islamic Sharia law, the semi-official Tasnim news agency reported on...
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran's supreme court has ruled that a woman must be blinded in one eye as punishment for an acid attack that left her victim sightless, using the principle of "eye for an eye" of Islamic Sharia law, the semi-official Tasnim news agency reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Iran to Blind Acid-Attack Woman in Retribution Punishment-Tasnim
headline.print_headline: Iran to Blind Acid-Attack Woman in Retribution Punishment-Tasnim
